content.text: I'm a single mom working two jobs to support my children. I love working out with music to help push myself. I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car. i have a dog and we go for walks. I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.

I got a puppy for my birthday. I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets. I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days. I want a place to cook and to entertain my friends and family. I went to the cinema with friends to watch the latest action movie.
Oh wow, we have some things in common! I also have a dog and I love to go for walks with her. I also love to cook and entertain my friends and family. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. My favorite is lasagna. I also love to make homemade pizza.
Yum, lasagna is my favorite too! I love to make it with a lot of cheese and meat.
Me too! I love to make it with a lot of ricotta cheese and ground beef.
I love to cuddle up with my dog on rainy days too. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a pug. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Pugs are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're the best dogs. They're so cuddly and loving.
I'm sure my kids would love a pug. They're always asking me for a dog.
You should definitely get them a pug! They're great dogs for families
